SENT.plain: Authors show the case of the 16 old years patient who was admitted to the hospital with symptoms of rise intracranial pressure sign as pseudotumor cerebri
The cause of those symptoms was thrombosis of sinus sagitalis superior confirmed by MR
Clinical analysis and immunological examination gave a diagnosis of secondary antiphospholipid syndrome in the course of Systemic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE)
